sentences.sContent: Our aim is to reduce road casualties .
sentences.sCn: 我们的目标是减少交通事故的伤亡人数。

synos.tran: 意外事故；伤亡人员；急诊室

phrases.pCn: 灾害保险；不幸事故保险

remMethod.val: casual(随便的) + ty → 因为随随便便造成的 → 伤亡

trans.tranCn: 意外事故；伤亡人员；急诊室
trans.tranOther: the part of a hospital that people are taken to when they are hurt in an accident or suddenly become ill
